thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: rhonhathaway

author: rhonhathaway
title: rhonhathaway
text: A friend handed down some clothes to me several years ago that had these little rubbery labels that would not come off. They had clearly been washed several times because they looked a little worn, but they were stuck on the clothing very well! I inquired about the labels and have been a customer ever since! I use these labels inside knit gloves, hats, ball caps, shoes, coats, backpacks, water bottles, sports equipment, etc. I have perfected the detail I put on them to include just our last name and phone number (including area code) for when these items do get lost, especially on vacation, they will hopefully fall in the hands of an honest person. They stay in place and survive daily use by 3 kids, as well as laundry!
